recipesJson.name: Xeta Melon
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description: Recipe from Haku Xeta Billet Box Re-Wick + Mixing XETA Melon watch the video here https://youtu.be/OPk4DMg6C6o

reviews.text: Some of the flavors appeared harsh to me initially, but within a couple of days that cleared up really nicely. Definitely more of a fresh melon flavor, and not a generic melon/strawberry profile. Very refreshing! I'd recommending adding WS-23 to taste (I used 0.25% because I'm a wimp).
